about_the_game:
This is a Cthulhu theme survival adventure game.

This game is recommended to all players who are crazy about the myth of Cthulhu.

In the game, you can play Vincent, the descendant of the survivors in the original "Cthulhu's Call", and a mysterious woman of unknown identity, and take an incredible adventure in a mansion on a South Pacific island.

In the game, you can see many monsters from the world of Cthulhu, including Mi-Go, Old Ones, Dunwich monsters, moon beasts, ghouls, Night-gaunt, deep ones, Hounds of Tindalos，and so on. There are even clues to Nyarlathotep and The King in Yellow, They are not only enemies who hinder you, but may also be your allies.

You need to collect weapons and items, fight against sudden enemies, rescue imprisoned people, and find very important key items such as The Necronomicon.

Moreover, Vincent and Afra have completely different gameplay and processes, not just changing the character's appearance.

The game emphasizes combat and exploration, as well as storytelling. An incredible conspiracy will gradually unfold to players as the story progresses.

Story:

Three years ago,historian Stephan found an island which had never been recorded in South Pacific as well as some mysterious clues in the island. Stephan told this secret to a related important person,Colin Caste.
The possibility of this clue motivated him,he couldn't wait to land the island and block the news from spreading. Caste decided to use his power to gather people,build courier stations and began to search the island. Eventually,a month ago,Caste witnessed it,everyone was shocked… … …
As the investigation goes deeper,an unameable fear hangs over all the people involved in this event. Major differences appeared in internal views. But Caste's wire-puller required him to bring the findings back to the human society to exchange for infinite treasures and powers.
Driven by pressures and vital interests,Caste decided to take risks to remove that untouchable thing to the Northern Hemisphere. When all things are in tense progress,four days ago,diasters happened…



This game describes a disaster caused by Star-Spawn, where all the humans on the island become "originer".
However, this is only a disaster for humanity, and the purpose of Star-Spawn is to purify the Earth they originally ruled over.
Isn't the origin of humanity from Earth?
Why hasn't Vincent become "originer"? Who is the mysterious woman Afra? Can we really follow Mi-Go to Yuggoth?
With rich gameplay and thrilling adventures, you will find that every monster you eliminate has a human identity, and they will give you the answers you want. The story secrets in the game are waiting for you to uncover, and the ultimate outcome hides an incredible truth

About us:

Obsession Studio is a development team with only two people at the core. Due to our love for Cthulhu themes, We need a game that can truly delve into the original story, play important roles related to the original story, and actually encounter and confront the charming monsters in many of the original stories. We need a game that embodies the main theme of Lovecraft's original work, full of mystery, despair, and adventure stories, so we decided to fulfill these desires ourselves. And I hope this adventure can satisfy all the players who also love and are interested in the theme of Cthulhu.
If the game can be loved by players, we are also preparing to launch DLC in the future to improve the game's worldview.
